metadata.subject: Re: Gulfstream V - offmarket, sleeper aircraft

relationships.description: Friends and colleagues in aircraft business

analysis.purpose: To arrange communication about purchasing an off-market Gulfstream V aircraft
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's interest in acquiring high-end private aircraft through non-public channels

notable_quotes: I need to start off by stating that it is not my intent to go around Shawn Lancaster on this â€” Shawn is a friend.
there are eight (8) of these aircraft that are not yet on the market
his company sold Trumps 727 and got Trump a very attractive number for an aircraft that was on it's way to a museum

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this communication

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Eric Roth discussing the potential purchase of an off-market Gulfstream V aircraft, with Roth offering to connect Epstein with a contact who has access to non-public aircraft listings and previously handled Trump's aircraft sale.
